ranked_diseases.explanation: The patient presents with self-healing squamous epithelioma, a hallmark feature leading to the diagnosis of Multiple Self-Healing Squamous Epithelioma, also known as Ferguson-Smith syndrome. The reference cases diagnosis supports this condition.

Although less common with only self-healing squamous epitheliomas present, Basal Cell Nevus Syndrome can include various skin lesions among its presentations. Some rare cases may have overlapping features.
